name: Nozomi "Gourmet King"
description: This social link requires LV.2 charm and you need to answer questions in this order Pheromone Coffee > Green > Hagakure Bowl, then give him an Odd Morsel from your inventory in order to be started. He's located at Paulownia Mall, Monday-Saturday.
ranks: Rank 3: You are the Gourmet King
Rank 7: Wiped off the face of ?? > Anything
unlocks: For completing this social link you are able to fuse Sandalphon through Pentagon fusion using Garuda, Horus, Suzaku, Yatagarasu and Gurr.
